item.title: EP 18 - Hobbit Hooligans
item.itunes:title: Hobbit Hooligans
item.description:
Today we look at the ultra rare Despair Code conspiracy and examine whether or not “Lord Of The Rings” is actually a historical document.

Patreon 

https://www.patreon.com/user?u=18482113

MERCH STORE!!!
https://tinyurl.com/y8zam4o2

J. R. R. Tolkien is a beloved author worldwide. But did you know his Middle-Earth books are based on ancient world history texts he read in the basement of the library of Oxford? You didn’t know that? You didn’t know Hobbits were actually the Irish and they had to fight . . .wait, why am I spoiling this awesome podcast episode!

Also, The Despair Code is a little known but highly sought after conspiracy theory. What is the Despair Code. What does it do? Does anyone know what it is? We found someone who may have those answers!

Links:Tolkien’s Middle-Earth, true History?

http://blog.world-mysteries.com/ancient-writings/tolkiens-middle-earth-true-history/

Quick rundown of the Despair Codehttps://i.redd.it/kyem1cpm4tt01.png

Listen to the daily podcast anywhere you listen to podcasts!

------------------------------------------------

Logo Art By Ash Black
Opening Song: "Atlantis Attacks"
Closing Song: "Bella Royale"
Music By Dr. Huxxxtable
Hood River

Paranormal, Conspiracy, and True Crime news as it happens! Jason Carpenter breaks the stories they'll be talking about tomorrow, assuming the world doesn't end today.

All Contents Of This Podcast Copyright Jason Carpenter 2018 - 2020
